sub_title: Business Development Director at Unusual Enterprise
summary:
I am a senior project manager at the Netherlands Foreign Investment Agency (NFIA) based in Consulate General of the Kingdom of the Netherlands in Istanbul and I am responsible for assisting companies in Turkey which consider investing in the Netherlands. 

Free, confidential services offered include: connecting you with up-to-date information, relevant business partners, government authorities and a variety of Dutch networks and service suppliers;
organizing fact-finding trips and site selection missions with network of regional economic development partners; arranging meetings with these partners; and providing personalized guidance and counsel on tax, government and permit procedures, location options and business solutions.

Specialties: Foreign Direct Investment - Acquisition of new projects for The Netherlands, Stakeholder Management, Public Affairs, Strategy Development, Business Development, Project Management, Marketing & Communication, Innovation, Innovation Management, Sales

certifications.name: AUTM Technology Valuation and Startup Business Development Training
Digital and Social Media Marketing Management

projects.title: TUBITAK Marmara Technopark Entrepreneurship Camp 2014
projects.description:
A one week crash-course for entrepreneurs from different universities all over Turkey! 

Young entrepreneurs will learn aspects of entrepreneurship and how to create a business – from developing the idea to networking basics, play entertaining, instructive games and stay under the roof of TUBITAK, Scientific and Technological Research Council of Turkey.

projects.title: The Scientific & Technological Research Council of Turkey, Technology Transfer Offices Support Program
projects.description: The project contributes to the development of university-industry collaboration, technology, and support the process of commercialization of academic research, With the logistical support and promotion aspect of the project, the effectiveness of technology transfer offices' interface functions.

profile_positions.description:
As an operational unit of the Ministry of Economic Affairs and Climate Policy, Netherlands Foreign Investment Agency (NFIA) helps and advises foreign companies in all phases of establishing, rolling out and/or expanding their international activities in the Netherlands. 

Fueled by public-private partnerships and Dutch innovation across industries, the Netherlands continues to draw interest from international companies. The NFIA is their first port of call, connecting them with its regional partners in the Invest in Holland Network and resources and tools they need to make their investment decision. NFIA can connect you with up-to-date information, relevant business partners, government authorities and a variety of Dutch networks and service suppliers, Organize fact-finding trips and site selection missions  with network of regional economic development partners to provide concrete solutions and counsel to simplify and enhance your establishment in the Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Senior Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Working with multidisciplinary project teams that focused in developing international R&D projects in Horizon 2020 
Performing user need assessment and understanding the need and/or industrial/societal challenge to be addressed
Analyzing the potential markets for application (size, location, dynamics, drivers)
Identifying existing and emerging competitive solutions and understanding their strengths and weaknesses
Performing technology scouting and brokerage activities by identifying novel technologies that have the potential to meet defined development needs
International business development activities that focuses on enhancing B2B, B2C and G2G bilateral relations 
Engaging with key stakeholders, such as end-users, manufacturing supply chain partners and research and technology providers for partner recruitment for potential project collaborations.
Organizing trade missions between Turkey and The Netherlands In collaboration with NFIA (The Netherlands Foreign Investment Agency) and other Economic Departments
Organizing training and networking events, seminars, workshops and other promotional activities to enhance Dutch knowledge and business in Turkey, as well as connecting the Dutch and Turkish ecosystems together in various topics.
Facilitated a seminar with stakeholders in composite industry in Turkey and the Netherlands to enhance collaboration.
Organizing tailor-made programs for visiting missions from The Netherlands in the context of trade, R&D and bilateral relations.
Accompanying delegations from Turkey to the Netherlands and assisting with proper planning and networking during the visits.
Preparing sectoral reports in different high technology sectors to inform about the latest developments in Turkey.
profile_positions.title: Advisor for Innovation, Technology & Science

profile_positions.description:
Preparing and implementing short/long term business development plans aligned with Bilişim Vadisi's strategy and targets.
Leading the business development and project team responsible for building productive relationships with existing and prospective customers
Conducting technology transfer activities
Facilitating the success of new business start-ups by mentoring on business analysis and finding the right funding
Promoting the collaboration between entrepreneurs, companies, and research institutes for the purpose of building an "innovative ecosystem" with the successful incubation and spin-off mechanism at Bilişim Vadisi Campus.
Establishing new business relationships between innovation-based companies and potential investors
Enhancing growth, competitiveness, and internationalization of entrepreneurs and companies by helping them stay informed on new global trends and models, government incentives, summits, conferences, exhibitions, seminars, reports and publications.
Counseling and Management in R&D Funding Program Projects such as Tübitak/Kosgeb/Development Agencies, Monitoring approved research projects.
Developing communication strategies for the company and leading the team in preparing or editing organizational publications for internal and external audiences, including newsletters and reports.
Establishing and maintaining cooperative relationships with representatives of community, consumer, employee, social media and public interest groups.
Studying the objectives, promotional policies and needs of organizations to develop communication and public relations strategies that will influence public opinion or promote ideas, products and services.
Consulting with advertising agencies or staff to arrange promotional campaigns in all types of media
Leading the team to create company literature and other forms of communication.
Managing the processes of creating marketing and promotional materials, both print and electronic.
profile_positions.title: Business Development & Corporate Relations Manager

profile_positions.description:
Performed counseling and management tasks in R&D Funding Projects such as TUBITAK/KOSGEB/Development Agencies
Prepared TUBITAK TEYDEB 1513 Technology Transfer Office Funding Project Proposal worth 5 million TL for Marmara Technopark
Ensured the persistency and durability of knowledge acquisition by documenting the outputs of projects
Generated the sustainability reports of R&D projects for control mechanisms such as governmental and finance institutions.
Organised training and match making events for entrepreneurs and investors.
Managed the Incubation Center in Marmara Technopark
Prepared organizational publications for internal and external audiences, including newsletters and reports.
Provided support to create company literature and other forms of communication.
Created marketing and promotional materials, both print and electronic.
Worked with advertisers for timely and useable ad submissions,
Developed marketing communications campaigns for events and projects.
profile_positions.title: Business Development, IP & Technology Transfer Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Tracked and managed the sales process, and sales agreements with the key accounts of Ülker and its contracted distributors,
Managed sales and market activity staff, consisting of 20+ sales personnel
Managed sales activities in the field according to the monthly sales targets,
Executed the monitoring of monthly sales and inventory reports.
Sales route planning in appointed sales areas.
Direct/indirect sales activities
Managed the coordination and control of point of sale activities in supermarkets. 
Prepared daily/weekly/monthly sales and activity reports according to sales objectives

Evaluation of credit and loan applications according to current banking regulations.
Evaluate the risk management of applicants.
